p.span: New families are invited to attend an Open House.

div.p: The ASU Preparatory Academy website is the official source of information about the Novel Coronavirus as it relates to the daily operations of our schools and campuses. Factual information regarding our schools will be posted on this site and sent home via school emails as needed. We encourage you to also remain up to date regarding health information that is being shared by the larger ASU community by visiting the ASU Health Services website. Please rely on information that link directly from these sites and be aware that other sources may not reflect the most current and accurate information.
